title: Whole Farm Assessment of Nutrient Extraction from Dairy Manure

tasks.task: Conducting a whole farm assessment of nutrient extraction technologies.
subtasks: Presenting personal introduction and credentials of the speaker.
Explaining the objective of the study: evaluating the impact of nutrient extraction technologies on farm profitability and environmental factors.
Describing the model used (i.e., integrated farm system model) and its components.
Detailing the simulated farm's characteristics, including dairy cows, crops, and manure management system.
Discussing the impact of alternating manure systems (flush vs. scrape) on energy and labor costs.
Analyzing the effect of using a decanter centrifuge for P extraction on costs and environmental factors.
Evaluating the economics of using the decanter centrifuge for excess P removal.

tasks.task: Presenting the conclusions from the study.
